Product Id: Control and Sale of Alcoholic Beverages in Canada
Data may not add to the total due to rounding.

Per capita sales by value are based on the population of inhabitants of legal age to buy, use, possess, and grow recreational cannabis. The population estimates are based on table 17-10-0005-01 Estimates of Population, by age group and sex for July 1, Canada, provinces, and territories, annual (persons).
During the 2021/2022 reference year, cannabis vapes were banned in Newfoundland and Labrador. This ban was reversed during the 2022/2023 reference year.
Cannabis vapes and topicals are not sold in Quebec. Solid edibles were not sold until the 2022/2023 reference year, but sales data are unavailable for that reference year.
Cannabis vapes are not sold in Prince Edward Island.
